scenario_text.value:
Ryo still hasn’t opened up to Kunemon, from
the looks of things.

Well, I get how he feels. Of course you’d be
scared with all this crazy stuff happening.

Nope... Huh, I wonder why not? I probably
should be, now that I think about it...
Maybe it’s because I’m with you!
Ha ha ha, sorry. I’m counting on you, Agumon.
I wish Ryo and Kunemon would get along...
